nodes.text: Supply was an Imperial Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport retrofitted to be a supply ship that would provide starfighters with more warheads should they run out. The ship was present on the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Garrett.
The transport appears in Star Wars: TIE Fighter, battle 13 mission 4, to resupply the player's craft, despite the combat utility vehicle being introduced for the same purpose.
